T02D1967:106b-0: @106b # // bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1967:106b-2: yang rang nyid yi dam du bsgoms la /
T02D1967:106b-4: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
T02D1967:106b-5: de la gshin rje'i lha tshogs bsams la /
T02D1967:106b-6: de la dgug gzhug byas la //
T02D1967:107a-1: pa g-yas pa bdag gi thugs ka nas bton la /
T02D1967:107a-2: srin mtheb kyis bdud rtsi gtor zhing //
T02D1967:107a-3: aom a'a: h'um brjod pas lha mnyes par bsam /
T02D1967:107a-4: de nas lha rnams rang gi spyi bo na mar thim par bsam /
T02D1967:107a-5: lag pa'i chad de snod du gtigs so //
T02D1967:107a-6: tshogs kyi phud rnams la gtor ma bya zhing /
T02D1967:107a-7: lhag ma rnams la bdud rtsir gyur pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02D1967:107a-8: gtor ma rnams 'byung po rnams la dbul lo //
T02D1967:107a-9: de nas rnal 'byor pho mo rnams rang rang gi thugs dam mchod cing bsgom pa dang /
T02D1967:107a-10: bzlas pa byas nas las kyi slob dpon gyis gzigs shig la sog pa'i ba dan dang /
T02D1967:107a-12: de nas tshogs la rol lo //
T02D1967:107a-13: de'i bar du gleng mo dang /
T02D1967:107a-16: 'gro na phyag gsum btsal la zhus la 'gro'o //
T02D1967:107a-17: de nas lhag gtor gtang ngo //
